input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Northlight Canadian Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Perry Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Slim Pencil Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Charlton Home Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Buffalo Fir 5' Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ebern Designs 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Vickerman Black Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Ebern Designs 7' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With 818 Realistic Branch Tips'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Peabody Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Canadian Pine Medium Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar artificial Christmas tree but different species (Canadian Pine vs. Dunhill Fir) and no mention of pre-lit features or hinged branches, making it somewhat relevant but not very close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Perry Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: From the same brand with pre-lit feature similar to Dunhill Fir and likely similar construction, but different model name and possibly different shape or branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Slim Pencil Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but slim pencil shape and unlit, differing significantly in branch fullness and lighting compared to the full-bodied pre-lit Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar species (Douglas Fir) but slim and unlit, differing in fullness, lighting, and possibly branch construction from the Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Buffalo Fir 5' Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir type and artificial Christmas tree but unlit and smaller height, making it reasonably relevant but less so due to lighting and size differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar tree species but unlit and slim profile versus full-bodied pre-lit, hence moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ebern Designs 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir species and height but unlit and no mention of hinged branches or fullness comparable to Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman Black Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree but no indication of lighting or branch features and Black Fir may differ in look and construction from Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to other slim unlit Douglas Fir trees, making it only moderately relevant due to differences in fullness, lighting, and assembly features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ebern Designs 7' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With 818 Realistic Branch Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Offers many realistic branch tips similar to Dunhill Fir, but slim profile and unlit status reduce relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Peabody Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another fir artificial tree likely full bodied, although no mention of pre-lit or hinged branches, making it fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact same model as the reference product, matching all features, construction, and intended use.
